arguments.name: source
arguments.description: The source image path, URL, a variable that is read into the new image, or a Java buffered image.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the new image. Valid when the height is specified and the source is not.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the new image. Valid when the width is specified and the source is not.

arguments.name: imageType
arguments.description:
The type of the image to create (Valid only when width and height are specified):
- rgb
- argb
- grayscale

arguments.name: canvasColor
arguments.description:
Color of the image canvas (The default value is "black"):
- Hexadecimal value of RGB color. For example, specify the color white as ##FFFFFF or FFFFFF.
- String value of color (for example, "black", "red", "green").
- List of three numbers for (R,G,B) values. Each value must be in the range 0-255.
